name: The Shift At Freddy's (EA)
description:
Welcome to your new job! Survive from 12AM to 3AM. Monitor the area to see if there are any "entities" that may be roaming. 

TSAF is a 2D Five Nights At Freddy's FanGame. This is only an early access project that can only be found here. (So Far) 

Do you have what it takes to solve the mystery of Freddy's?
